name: Ansible
description: App deployment, configuration management and orchestration - all from one system.

name: Ceph
description: An open source and freely available distributed object store and file system that relies on Reliable Autonomic Distributed Object Store (RADOS).

name: ManageIQ
description: Manage containers, virtual machines, networks, and storage from a single platform.

name: oVirt
description: An open source virtualization platform powered by KVM on Linux<sup>®</sup> with an easy-to-use web interface that manages virtual machines, storage, and networks.

name: Project Atomic
description: Use immutable infrastructure to deploy and scale your containerized applications.

name: PatternFly
description: Created to promote design commonality and improved user experience across enterprise IT products and applications.
